titles: The character of a time-serving saint or, The hypocrite anatomized, and thorowly dissected.
author: Lockyer, Lionel, 1600?-1672.
notes: Signed in last stanza: "Men do me Lionel Lockier call; others by the name of Rant,".
Verse - "The heavens do frown, the earth doth groan,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
